head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ISENBURGER, JULA ELENBOGEN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ISENBURGER, JULA ELENBOGEN

block.p: ISENBURGER-Jula Elenbogen. Born Poland 1908; died New York 17 April 2000. Femme extraordinaire: Dancer-in the 1930's-at Salzburg, Berlin, and later throughout France as Jula Geris. For more than sixty years, devoted wife of the late painter Eric Isenburger. Beloved and remembered as an autodidact of the finest sensibilities, a brilliantly sparkling and witty conversationalist, a self-possessed woman with a rare genius for life.

ISENBURGER-Jula Elenbogen. Born Poland 1908; died New York 17 April 2000. Femme extraordinaire: Dancer-in the 1930's-at Salzburg, Berlin, and later throughout France as Jula Geris. For more than sixty years, devoted wife of the late painter Eric Isenburger. Beloved and remembered as an autodidact of the finest sensibilities, a brilliantly sparkling and witty conversationalist, a self-possessed woman with a rare genius for life.
